title: Latest Adverse News on J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC
reasoning: Significant financial penalties and regulatory scrutiny faced by J.P. Morgan Securities PLC.
news:
1. [J.P. Morgan Fined $3M for Misreporting 77 Billion Shares - Yahoo Finance](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/j-p-morgan-fined-3m-110917606.html)  FINRA Slaps J.P. Morgan with $3M Fine Over Short Interest Errors. J.P. Morgan Securities had since put in place enhanced policies and periodic reviews to resolve.

2. [J.P. Morgan to Pay $150M to Settle Slew of SEC Charges - Wealth Management](https://www.wealthmanagement.com/regulation-compliance/j-p-morgan-to-pay-150m-to-settle-slew-of-sec-charges)  J.P. Morgan will pay more than $150 million between its investment management and securities arms to settle a myriad of SEC charges, the regulators unveiled in several settlements Thursday.

3. [SEC.gov | JP Morgan Affiliates to Pay $151 Million to Resolve SEC Charges](https://www.sec.gov/newsroom/press-releases/2024-178)  The Securities and Exchange Commission charged J.P. Morgan Securities LLC and J.P. Morgan Investment Management Inc. in five separate enforcement actions for failures including misleading disclosures to investors, breach of fiduciary duty, prohibited joint transactions, and principal trades.

4. [SEC announces charges, $151 million penalties against JPMorgan affiliates - Securities Law](https://www.securitieslaw.com/blog/2024/11/sec-announces-charges-151-million-penalties-against-jpmorgan-affiliates/)  J.P. Morgan Securities and J.P. Morgan Investment Management will pay a combined $151 million to resolve a series of enforcement actions involving misconduct.

5. [CFTC Orders J.P. Morgan to Pay $200m for Supervision Errors - Markets Media](https://www.marketsmedia.com/cftc-orders-j-p-morgan-to-pay-200m-for-supervision-failures/)  The Commodity Futures Trading Commission issued an order against J.P. Morgan Securities for failing diligently to supervise its business, resulting in failure to capture billions of orders in its surveillance systems.
